title: Day 804
content:
# Day 804

![[https://store.bitbo.io/collections/hats/products/bitcoin-sauna-hat](https://store.bitbo.io/collections/hats/products/bitcoin-sauna-hat)](https://miro.medium.com/0*dTyHFl8tk1187HXn.png)

I am tempted to buy something like this. On the one hand it's not great operational security.

On the other hand it's an amazing tool for striking up conversations with others while I'm in the sauna. Maybe I'll ask friends and family to get me this for my birthday. To be determined.

6/3/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
